New Test Cases.title: Test Case HAP-529 TS-002 TC-001 - Validate Repository Visibility Setting During Creation

Steps.Step_Desc: Navigate to the repository creation page.
Select 'Public' as the repository visibility option.
Complete all required fields and submit the form to create the repository.
Verify the created repository's visibility is set to 'Public'.

Steps.Expected: Repository visibility is displayed as 'Private' when 'Private' is selected during creation.
